## GenericFunction

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/context/async-context.ts" sourceLine="13" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a generic function type that can accept any number of arguments.

```ts title="Signature"
type GenericFunction<A extends any[] = any[]> = (...args: A) => any
```
